document.title: Vous aimez les indés ? Vous aimez les Français ? Vous aimez les promo ? Alors vous aimerez ces promo de jeux indés français sur Steam
document.author: Anh - NeoAngel
document.text:
Une promo spéciale made in France sur Steam, avec 15 jeux bradés au programme dont Blocks That Matter, Ethan: Meteor Hunter ou encore Strike Vector .
Strike Vector
more Mesdames, messieurs, vous avez 48 heures. On vous recommandera tout particulièrement NaissanceE , 9/10 chez nous , ou Tetrobot and Co. , auréolé d’un 8/10 dans nos colonnes . Blocks That Matter -50% http://store.steampowered.com/app/111800/ Ethan: Meteor Hunter -80% http://store.steampowered.com/app/266330/ Evoland -50% http://store.steampowered.com/app/233470/ Finding Teddy -75% http://store.steampowered.com/app/259600 Fly’N -75% http://store.steampowered.com/app/223730 Jamsouls -30% http://store.steampowered.com/app/314460/ Kill The Bad Guy -50% http://store.steampowered.com/app/293940/ Long Night -25% http://store.steampowered.com/app/270590/ Mechanic Escape -70% http://store.steampowered.com/app/268240 NaissanceE -50% http://store.steampowered.com/app/265690 Quest Run -70% http://store.steampowered.com/app/286120/ Shufflepuck Cantina Deluxe -66% http://store.steampowered.com/app/259510 Strike Vector -50% http://store.steampowered.com/app/246700/ Tetrobot and Co. -50% http://store.steampowered.com/app/235980/ Type:Rider -50% http://store.steampowered.com/app/258890/
